3. Grindelwald, Interlaken and Lauterbrunnen Day Tour


# Grindelwald, Interlaken and Lauterbrunnen Day Tour

Partly guided tour with free time to explore the Jungfrau region

4.6

·

Excellent

273 reviews

Show all photos

Free cancellation available

Up to 24 hours before the start time

Duration: 12 hours

This full-day tour will give you a chance to explore the scenic Jungfrau region of the Swiss Alps. You'll board a comfortable bus that will take you through the countryside towards Interlaken, a town set between two lakes.

After a brief orientation session, you'll continue to the popular village of Grindelwald, where you can visit some of the lookout points to see the peaks of the Eiger, Mönch and Jungfrau. You’ll also have free time to take the cable car up to Grindelwald First, followed by a 45-yard-long cliff walk.

Your guide will then take you to Lauterbrunnen, a beautiful village nestled between towering cliffs and cascading waterfalls, before heading back to Zurich.

## Why Visit

- Scenic bus and train ride through a mountainous landscape
- Free time in Grindelwald to explore the area and lookouts
- Opportunity to purchase souvenirs while shopping in Interlaken

## What's included

- Guide services
- Transportation

## What's Not Included

What's not included

- Food
- Refreshments
- Cable car, rentals and admission
- Personal expenses

### Restrictions

- Visitors need to show a valid photo ID.

- Arrive at least 15 minutes before the start time.

- Comfortable footwear is recommended.

- Operates in all weather conditions. Please dress accordingly.

### Additional information

A guide will accompany you from Zurich to Grindelwald and from Interlaken to Zurich.

This tour is conducted by a multilingual guide.

External weather conditions are beyond the tour provider's control. Consequently, no refunds will be offered due to poor or less than ideal weather.

Refunds aren't possible for last-minute tour cancelations due to flight changes or unforeseen health issues. Please consider a travel insurance before your trip to cover such situations.

Bring your ticket with you to the attraction.

Show more

### Location

### Meeting point

Limmatstrasse 2, Zurich, 8005

The departure point is at Sihlquai bus station (Limmatstrasse 2), located behind the train station, in front of Ferd Hotel.

The meeting point is at a white ticket booth with a 'Best of Switzerland Tours' or 'Tickets here' sign written on it.

### Frequently asked questions

#### How do I book a ticket?

- Select a date and time.

- Choose the number of tickets.

- Click to the next page and enter your personal details.

- After entering your personal details, select your payment method and enter your payment details.

- Once you’ve entered your payment details, you’ll be redirected to the ticket page where you can check the status and details of your reservations.

- You'll receive a confirmation email once the reservation is confirmed with the attraction operator. This could take some time depending on the supplier.

- You can view your tickets in the confirmation email or in the Bookings & Trips section of your account.


* * *

#### When do I pay?

Booking.com collects payment on behalf of the attraction operator when you book your ticket.

* * *

#### How do digital tickets work?

Each digital ticket contains a unique code. This is usually a QR or numerical code, but could be something else and can be found on your ticket or the PDF sent to you.

If your digital ticket contains a barcode or QR code, show it to the staff at the attraction's entrance or ticket collection point for them to scan.

For those with numerical codes, show your ticket to staff for verification.

* * *

#### Can I cancel or modify my tickets?

You’ll need to check the policy on the specific ticket you book. Last-minute bookings might not have free cancellation available.

* * *

#### When will I get my free cancellation refund?

After you cancel, we'll issue a full refund immediately. Depending on your bank or payment provider, it can take 3–10 days to be refunded to your original payment method.

metadata.ogTitle: Grindelwald, Interlaken and Lauterbrunnen Day Tour
metadata.description: Find out about Grindelwald, Interlaken and Lauterbrunnen Day Tour like tour times and location. Book tickets online with free cancellation and skip-the-line access!
metadata.title: Grindelwald, Interlaken and Lauterbrunnen Day Tour Zurich – Booking.com
metadata.og:description: Partly guided tour with free time to explore the Jungfrau region

json.Attraction_name: Grindelwald, Interlaken and Lauterbrunnen Day Tour
Why visit: Scenic bus and train ride through a mountainous landscape
Free time in Grindelwald to explore the area and lookouts
Opportunity to purchase souvenirs while shopping in Interlaken
Restrictions: Visitors need to show a valid photo ID.
Arrive at least 15 minutes before the start time.
Operates in all weather conditions. Please dress accordingly.
additional Information: A guide will accompany you from Zurich to Grindelwald and from Interlaken to Zurich.
This tour is conducted by a multilingual guide.
External weather conditions are beyond the tour provider's control. Consequently, no refunds will be offered due to poor or less than ideal weather.
Refunds aren't possible for last-minute tour cancellations due to flight changes or unforeseen health issues. Please consider travel insurance before your trip to cover such situations.
Bring your ticket with you to the attraction.
